attributes.action: Look at new waste to energy technology
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Technology developed in the UK exists to convert waste into energy and biofuels without using incineration. The waste generated should produce the same amount of energy as the proposed nuclear power stations. It is clean, reduces landfill and safe
